analysis: The documents in this cluster primarily concern adjustments to the rates of pay and allowances for various categories of federal employees, including those in the General Schedule, Foreign Service, Veterans Health Administration, Senior Executive Service, uniformed services, and members of the Executive, Legislative, and Judicial branches. Some orders also address locality-based comparability payments and interim geographic adjustments. The documents span several decades and reflect changes in legislation and economic conditions affecting federal compensation.
title: Federal Employee Compensation Adjustments
